channel.title: Imperius - A new meaning to RSPS!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://www.rsps.imperius-gaming.com/images/styles/TheBeaconDark/style_blue/logo.png[/img][/center] [center]Imperius is a newly released RSPS so we are in need of players. We have a decent amount of training locations, bosses & minigames. I will be doing a weekly drop party or giveaway to everyone (Uncommon/Common/Rares). The server is hosted 24/7. If you think this server is shit, please give us a try. [b]Everyone will get a good starter package (Torva, Pernix, Primal, Bandos, Statius, Vesta, Armadyl & etc)[/b].[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/biHNR7E.png[/img][URL=http://www.rsps.imperius-gaming.com/forum.php]Imperius - Home[/URL][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0JYWjpg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qN4hPmo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wXTBI3Q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rOHTQDB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/17Dh7h3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jI5VrmV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UgQl2to.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Imperius - A new meaning to RSPS!
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:2, topic:540996”]Looks decent, I’m going to play this.
EDIT: Your ::pure command doesn’t work. And make it so when I do ::players, a list of players comes up. So far so good I guess.[/quote]

Dave is pro:

::pure dosent work, why are you saying stuff is going to happen when it isnt omgg

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:4, topic:540996”]ikr. It says there’s ::pure but it noo workin :C

edit: it says do ::pure to get 99attk and str upon login. But it doesn’t work :([/quote]

::pure is now working. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Read full topic
